q: what does this video teach us
pred: The video teaches us the importance of proper foot care and the proper way to tie shoelaces. The woman in the video demonstrates how to tie shoelaces using the technique of tying them in a figure eight knot. This technique helps to prevent the shoelaces from coming undone and keeps the foot secure in the shoe. The video also shows the woman demonstrating how to tie the shoelaces on both the right and left feet.
